channel.title: When I ::yell it yells from "Donator" and "Owner"
channel.description:
Hi guys, when I make myself donator I type ::yell hi then it says
[Donator] Random: Hi [Owner] Random: Hi
I'm not even owner why does it say [Owner] Random: Hi The rights of my character is not the same as owner and not the member status :S HELP!

item.title: When I ::yell it yells from "Donator" and "Owner"
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

[quote=“mashamaru, post:7, topic:391801”]use this code

[quote]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;
if (donator == 1) {
titles = "[Donator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Administrator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[OWNER] ";
}
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = “[Player]”;
}
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = "[Player] ";
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}
[/quote][/quote]
Thats a delta code he needs a PI one. There needs to be minor adjustments.

Read full topic
item.source: When I ::yell it yells from "Donator" and "Owner"

item.title: When I ::yell it yells from "Donator" and "Owner"
item.dc:creator: @mashamaru mashamaru
item.description:
@mashamaru wrote:

use this code

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Donator] "; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Moderator] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Administrator] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[OWNER] "; } if (playerRights == 4) { titles = "[Player]"; } if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "[Player] "; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

Read full topic

item.title: When I ::yell it yells from "Donator" and "Owner"
item.dc:creator: @jaspertjeoo jaspertjeoo
item.description:
@jaspertjeoo wrote:

[quote=“noobwalker, post:4, topic:391801”]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”) && c.playerRights <= 10 && c.memberStatus >= 10) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("[@blu@Donator@bla@] " + c.playerName + “: @blu@” + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)));[/quote]
i dont see the [OWNER] in it…?
am i blind :c?!

Read full topic
